text: Raphaelle "Rafy" Veronica Ortega-David (born March 14,1997) is a Filipina politician who serves as the governor of La Union. ==Career== Ortega-David became the first female governor of La Union when she won the 2022 gubernatorial election. She succeeded her father Francisco Ortega III for the position. ==Personal life== She was married to Kevin David on January 17, 2023. == References == Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Ilocos Category:1997 births
title: Raphaelle Ortega-David
